message: Documentation for the current BETA Cryogen API.

Any bugs in the API can be submitted through the website just like in-game bugs. The API is very limited at the moment, but that is mainly due to not knowing what people would like to do with it. Should you make a suggestion with a feature for the API, i will most likely add it, I want people to have full API coverage for whatever they need.
Although the API mainly serves the server, I have added endpoints for the forums for ease of access.
This section of the API is very limited at the moment, and will need a serious overhaul soon incorperating linked forum accounts.

endpoints.description: Returns a parsed version of a forum post.

return.name: success
return.description: Whether action was successful or not.

return.name: error
return.description: Error message if success returns false.

return.name: post
return.description: Returns a PostDAO object containing information about the post.

endpoints.description: Returns a list of posts filtered by 'filter' parameter

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter for which posts to view, currently only supports 'latest'

return.name: success
return.description: Whether action was successful or not.

return.name: error
return.description: Error message if success returns false.

return.name: threads
return.description: Returns a list of PostDAO objects containing information about the post.

endpoints.description: Returns amount of players online. Can be configured with a filter.

return.name: success
return.description: Whether action was successful or not.

return.name: error
return.description: Error message if success returns false

return.name: online
return.description: DAO containing information on players online.

endpoints.description: Returns information about minigames in Cryogen.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: List of minigames to filter return value from

return.name: success
return.description: Whether action was successful or not.

return.name: error
return.description: Error message if success returns false

return.name: active
return.description: Name of the currently active minigame.

return.name: remaining
return.description: Time remaining until next active minigame in milliseconds.

return.name: minigames
return.description: Map containing information on minigames in Cryogen.

endpoints.description: Get client data about a specific version.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the client to return data for.

return.name: success
return.description: Whether action was successful or not.

return.name: error
return.description: Error message if success returns false

return.name: version
return.description: Version of the client data returned.

return.name: last_update
return.description: Last update to client when this version was released.

return.name: is_latest
return.description: Whether version returned is latest released.

endpoints.description: Download a certain version of the Cryogen client.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the client to download.

parameters.name: expiry
parameters.description: Duration for the token to be active. Default: 3 hours

parameters.name: revoke
parameters.description: Option to revoke all other tokens for your account on successful login.

return.name: success
return.description: Whether login was successful or not.

return.name: error
return.description: Error message if success returns false

return.name: expiry
return.description: Time in millis of when the token will expire.

return.name: token
return.description: Token to be used in authenticating with the Cryogen API.

endpoints.description: Returns status information about the server, website, or client.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Which action to query the status of.

return.name: uptime
return.description: Time passed since server start in milliseconds.

return.name: formatted
return.description: Time passed since server start formatted into a String

endpoints.description: Returns information about updates made to the Cryogen website, server, and client.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filters separated by a comma. Available filters: web, server, and client

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of updates to return. Max 50.

return.name: commits
return.description: List of DAOs containing information on a Github commit.

endpoints.description: Returns informatino about your in-game account. To be expanded upon.

return.name: username
return.description: Your in-game username.

return.name: display_name
return.description: Your in-game display name.

return.name: creation_time
return.description: DAO containing information on your creation time.
